Description.Text:
Property Location
With a stay at Thurnham Hall in Lancaster (Thurnham), you'll be close to Lancaster University and Forrest Hills. This 4-star aparthotel is within the vicinity of Old Holly Farm and Williamson Park.

Rooms
Make yourself at home in one of the 60 guestrooms, featuring kitchens with refrigerators and microwaves. Wireless Internet access (surcharge) keeps you connected, and DVD players are provided for your entertainment. Conveniences include phones, as well as coffee/tea makers and sofa beds.

Rec, Spa, Premium Amenities
Don’t miss out on the many recreational opportunities, including an indoor pool, a spa tub, and a sauna. Additional amenities include wireless Internet access (surcharge), wedding services, and a fireplace in the lobby.

Dining
Enjoy a satisfying meal at a restaurant serving guests of Thurnham Hall. Quench your thirst with your favorite drink at a bar/lounge.

Business, Other Amenities
Featured amenities include a 24-hour front desk, laundry facilities, and a library. Free self parking is available onsite.
